title: Chef Morty's Party Surprise
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,608 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 710L, Fiction Series
description: Chef Morty's Party Surprise follows young Morty as he helps his parents prepare for their party. He quickly becomes disappointed when he must miss out on playtime to help clean the house before the party. Although his conscience gets the best of him, it happens after he ruins the party. Illustrations support the text.
highFrequencyWords: anticipating, apology, frantically, hesitated, lingered, mimicked, mischievous, reflect, unpleasant
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
